title: If I can't claim judgment proof because I have equity in home but don't make enough money to pay debt will they take my home?
question: lawyer said that I can't do bk so either way I will be homeless
answers:
You will not lose your home if you file a Chapter 13 bankruptcy ...
but we don't have enough facts to determine whether that's feasible.

How much debt and have you tried working out a payment schedule with the creditor? Have you looked into a reverse mortgage? Depending on the amount of the debt, judgment creditro may file an Abstract of Judgment which would become a lien against your house.

No one can provide a meaningful answer, unless you have an in person consultation with an experienced CA bankruptcy attorney. Use AVVO's Find a Lawyer tool to select a qualified attorney. Good luck.
